snippet: Pete Ricketts, the Republican candidate for governor, can replace former Lt. Gov. Lavon L. Heidemann as his running mate on the November ballot, the Nebraska secretary of state, John A. Gale, said Wednesday.
abstract: Nebraska Secretary of State John A Gale says Pete Ricketts, Republican candidate for governor, can replace former Lt Gov Lavon L Heidemann as his running mate on the November ballot.
lead_paragraph: Pete Ricketts, the Republican candidate for governor, can replace former Lt. Gov. Lavon L. Heidemann as his running mate on the November ballot, the Nebraska secretary of state, John A. Gale, said Wednesday.
